channel.title: binary on Hexgolems
channel.description: Recent content in binary on Hexgolems

item.title: RDBG
item.description: A ruby programmable debugger library based on the linux ptrace API and /proc/$pid/ interfaces.

item.title: Indika
item.description: Robust semantic hashes for arbitrary x86 functions. Identify functions in very large database, even when compiled with different options.

item.title: Pint
item.description: Use LUA scripting for dynamic binary instrumentation and analysis using PIN.

item.title: SchemDBG
item.description: A web based debugger front-end for debugging and reversing binaries. Easily allows to create complex widgets and scripts.

item.title: CodeWars
item.description: A competitive programming challenge similar to Corewars, used in 2011 RWTH-CTF
